subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Vinny Prospal scored in the fourth round of a shootout last night for the Tampa Bay Lightning in a 4-3 victory over the visiting Ottawa Senators, who have now lost seven games in a row.
snippet: Vinny Prospal scored in the fourth round of a shootout last night for the Tampa Bay Lightning in a 4-3 victory over the visiting Ottawa Senators, who have now lost seven games in a row.
